snippet: A denizen of the world of corporate law, James Schwab, chairman of the media and entertainment group at Paul, Weiss will help oversee a $500 million war chest at the brash media outlet.
abstract: A denizen of the world of corporate law, James Schwab, chairman of the media and entertainment group at Paul, Weiss will help oversee a $500 million war chest at the brash media outlet.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: Vice Poaches a Lawyer from Paul, Weiss as Co-President
